Posted By: majinara (4/29/2012 8:31:13 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
It's some sort of [Soul Warden](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Soul Warden) as part of your manabase that only triggers with your Angels.  
Most of all, it does not enter tapped. In a monocolored Angel deck this doesn't seem bad at all actually.  
  
This card seems a bit underestimated as of now, since triggered abilities that profit from lifegain can get pretty powerful when you profit from them without any card disadvantage. (I'm thinking of cards like [Ajani's Pridemate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ajani's Pridemate) and [Well of Lost Dreams](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Well of Lost Dreams). The former makes a good early drop for your costy tribe, the latter provides card advantage by paying ![1](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1&type=symbol) more for each Angel - or just by playing the land)  
Last but not least, this might give you just the time you need to survive against an aggro deck.
posts.html:
It's some sort of Soul Warden as part of your manabase that only triggers with your Angels.
Most of all, it does not enter tapped. In a monocolored Angel deck this doesn't seem bad at all actually.

This card seems a bit underestimated as of now, since triggered abilities that profit from lifegain can get pretty powerful when you profit from them without any card disadvantage. (I'm thinking of cards like Ajani's Pridemate and Well of Lost Dreams. The former makes a good early drop for your costy tribe, the latter provides card advantage by paying more for each Angel - or just by playing the land)
Last but not least, this might give you just the time you need to survive against an aggro deck.

posts.post_content:
So, let me guess.  
The demon version of this card would be the following:  
When Demon Pits enter the battlefield, you lose 1 life.  
Whenever a demon enters the battlefield under your control, you lose 1 life.  
  
Tap, pay 1 life: Add one colorless mana to your mana pool.  
Spend only this mana to cast Demon spells.  
  
Whenever a demon dies, you lose 1 life.  
  
Sacrifice a demon, pay 1 life: You lose 1 life.  
  
...  
Sounds about right.  
  
Angels > Demons
